CustomField.formula: IF( OR( ISPICKVAL( Loop__Attach_As__c , "FTP"), ISPICKVAL( Loop__Attach_As__c , "SFTP") ) , IF( OR( ISBLANK( Loop__FTPDomain__c ) , ISBLANK( Loop__FTPUserName__c ) ) , "None" , Loop__FTPUserName__c & " @ " & IF( ISPICKVAL( Loop__Attach_As__c , "SFTP"), "s", "") & "ftp" & IF( Loop__SSL__c , "s" , "" ) & "://" & Loop__FTPDomain__c ) & " [" & HYPERLINK("/apex/loop__smtpPassword?ftp=true&id=" & Id & IF( ISPICKVAL( Loop__Attach_As__c , "SFTP"), "&sftp=true", "") , "Change" , "_self" ) & "]" , "None" )
CustomField.label: FTP
